/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -shared -Wl,-soname,PathPlanner_MRPT.so -o PathPlanner_MRPT.so CMakeFiles/PathPlanner_MRPT.dir/PathPlanner_MRPT.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PathPlanner_MRPT.dir/MobileRobotSVC_impl.cpp.o CMakeFiles/PathPlanner_MRPT.dir/__/idl/MobileRobotSK.cc.o CMakeFiles/PathPlanner_MRPT.dir/__/idl/MobileRobotDynSK.cc.o   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib: -lpthread -lRTC2 -lomniDynamic4 -lomniORB4 -lomnithread -lrtmCamera2 -lrtmManipulator2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-slam.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-hwdrivers.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-nav.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-gui.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-nanogui.so.2.4.2 -lglfw /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-vision.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-comms.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-maps.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-obs.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-tfest.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-graphs.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-kinematics.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-opengl.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-poses.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-bayes.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-img.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-io.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-math.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-serialization.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-rtti.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-random.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-config.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-expr.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-system.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-containers.so.2.4.2 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libmrpt-core.so.2.4.2
